# Build dependencies 

# Note: If you try to use code intelligence engine to highlight codes in Microsoft VSCode or something else,
#       you would need libglib2.0-dev and llvm-dev.

# build needed
binutils-dev
g++-9
g++-multilib
gcc-9
gcc-multilib
libboost-dev
libboost-regex-dev
libboost-serialization-dev
libboost-system-dev
libbsd-dev
libc6-dev-i386
libdwarf-dev
libelf-dev
libelf-dev:i386
libglib2.0-dev
libglib2.0-dev:i386
libjemalloc-dev
libmemcached-dev
libncurses5
libpixman-1-dev
libpng-dev
libpq-dev
libtinfo5
nasm
pkg-config
python3-docutils
zlib1g-dev

# Highlight needed
libglib2.0-dev
llvm-dev
